title: an unknown directx error league of legends
body:
An unkown DirectX error has occurred and League of Legends cannot start. Please make sure your video card is using the latest video drivers from the manufacturer."
I've tried to update it but its already updated.

All my drivers are up to date.

What I recently found out was when I disable my r200 gpu it works, but extremely laggy and unplayable to due the program being too slow to respond.

Also my PC overall has been atrociously slow in opening google, and files ect...

replies.body: If you're running an AMD, let's try going through the steps in [**this sticky**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/x6ylTzIT-5172017-directx-issues-with-amdradeon-graphics-cards) first. If you aren't on an AMD, we can still troubleshoot this by going through some of the steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as well.
